fields.label: Cover for extra charges for airfreight (MRe 007)
Cover for testing of machinery and installations (MRe 100)-4 weeks
Inland Transit (MRe 113): Limit AED per conveyance
Cover for insured contract works taken over or put into service (MRe 116)
Vibration, removal or weakening of support (MRe 120)
Automatic reinstatement clause at pro-rate additional premium
Cover for third party liability during maintenance (Section II)
Property being handled or lifted (Section II)
Motor contingent third party liability (Section II)
Legal liability arising out of plant & equipment (Section II)
Nominated Loss adjusters: To be selected by Insured from a Panel of  loss adjusters (Cunningham Lindsey, John Kidd LA, Miller International)
Cancellation clause-30 days either party subject to pro-rata refund of premium
Loss Notification  as soon as reasonably practicable

Brokers Claim Handling Clause : A loss notification received by the Insurance Broker will be deemed as a loss notification to Insurer. All communications flowing between the Insurer, Insured and the appointed Loss Surveyor should be channelized through the Broker, unless there is any unavoidable reasons compelling direct communications between the parties
